title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.9 - Limitation upon applicant for games of chance lessor license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.9 - Limitation upon applicant for games of chance lessor license

State Regulations

No applicant for a license as an authorized games of
chance lessor shall rent, or allow the use of, the premises for which a license
is sought for the conduct of games of chance unless it be duly licensed. This
section shall not apply to an applicant for the annual renewal of a games of
chance lessor's license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

4606.9

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
